testgroup.title: Hazard light suppression, left Automated Testcase

capltestcase.name: startVideo
capltestcase.title: 6- Show video to the camera with LEFT line approximation and lane change maneuver

capltestcase.name: WaitForSignalValue

capltestcase.name: WaitForSignalValueOutsideRange

capltestcase.name: TimeNowEnd
capltestcase.title: 14- End time measurement: min 1 second(s), but max 2 second(s) elapsed from start time

capltestcase.name: CheckSignalValueIsPermanentStart
capltestcase.title: 23- Start check : MPC_0x316::Lane_Assistant_Mode_Status_S has to remain 1 (LaneDeparture)

capltestcase.name: CheckSignalValueIsNotTaken_START
capltestcase.title: 24- Start check : MPC_0x316::Left_Line_Tracking_Status_S shall NOT take the value(s) 3

capltestcase.title: 25- Start check : MPC_0x316::Right_Line_Tracking_Stats_S shall NOT take the value(s) 3

capltestcase.name: CheckSignalValueIsPermanentStop
capltestcase.title: 27- End of check : MPC_0x316::Lane_Assistant_Mode_Status_S remained 1 (LaneDeparture)

capltestcase.name: CheckSignalValueIsNotTaken_STOP
capltestcase.title: 28- End of check : MPC_0x316::Left_Line_Tracking_Status_S should not take not allowed value(s) : 3
